column2: "Oh, hey there. It's been some time since only the two of us ran into each other."
"What happened to the Braver advertising I was doing? Ah, well... I got tired of it."
"Actually, I suppose that's not quite right. I wasn't doing it for the publicity in the first place."
"If I had to say why, it was to get the scoop on Bouncers."
"Once it served its purpose, I was like, \"Whatever.\" Apologizing to Io took a while, though."
"When you say, \"Hey! Support Bouncer!,\" cynics wouldn't bat an eye. \"In one ear, out the other,\" was it?"
"But when you say, \"Don't support those Bouncers, go Braver!,\" it gets more response, surprisingly."
"Of course, that can backfire and turn some people off, but most don't care."
"All said and done, you're going to choose the class that suits you best anyway."
"The 2nd Gen ARKS had no choice at all, but even the majority of 3rd Gens can't change their class once chosen."
"Out of everyone I know, you're about the only one who can change classes at will without skipping a beat."
"So how could I possibly say to you \"Go Braver or go home!\", you know?"
"When I realized there were people who could never make Braver work, I couldn't bear the responsibility anymore."
"You have to have the freedom to decide for yourself. You can't rely on others to do it for you."
"Fortunately, we live in a time where freedom is protected. Can't let that benefit slip by."
"Ah...haha. So sorry. I didn't mean to lecture you, but I did it again. Blame Regius for that."
"...Braver, Bouncer, it doesn't matter. You can be whatever you want to be."
"What's important is that you use those unique skills to survive."
"For that reason, we now have a large number of options... including Bouncer."
"To me, as long as everyone returns safely, they can do whatever they like."
